title: A Peach State of Mind
description: Best selling ~ Flight of a Valentine~ book one in the Valentine series, brings you to book two~A Peach State of Mind~Angela Valentine's story continues with her being back to where her mind and soul live, Atlanta Georgia. Glad to be home from a much needed break from her life. After more than a few issues have been brought to her attention, Angela realizes she has been blind to more aspects of her life than she originally thought. Angela no longer feels the need to take flight and now is ready to fight to get her life back in order, even if it means hurting some people along the way. Honesty hurts in more ways than one, sometimes we have to hurt ourselves in the process of finding peace and balance.
author: Angela Bradley
